title: Coach4Pro
summary: Coach4Pro is an all-in-one coaching management solution for coaches and athletes
description: Start using Coach4Pro for Professional Sports Training & Coaching today!Coach4Pro is the all-in-one professional coaching service that helps athletes, coaches and management to maximise their potential for greater results, in one easy to use system. Use the mobile application to track your results and the complementing web service to plan, analyse and report your performance over time.Coach4Pro enables you to set goals for your entire training season, define your training, nutrition and recovery plans, track your training results and analyse your performance against the set targets. You can share the results with your coach and team members, and communicate with messages and voice comments. The service enables you store the data, manage your files and manage your team.All your training data is automatically collected by the mobile application and transferred to your personal and private web profile, for further analysis, sharing and storage, at https://my.coach4pro.com. The data is fully secure, confidential and for you to decide with whom to share. All data transfer happens real time and worldwide. Different Bluetooth Smart compatible heart rate belts and sensors can be used with the application, depending on your sport, focus and measurement needs.Feature Highlights:Coach4Pro is the first digital, all-in-one professional coaching service for sports, including all the key features you need to define, measure, report and communicate your training progress, including:Diary: Access and manage your daily, weekly, monthly and annual calendars, with visualisations to different exercise, team and activity plans. Sync schedules, calendars and plans with your coach and team. Follow your longterm progress using the web service, adjust your season plans and review your progress against the plan.Exercises: Record your ad hoc or planned exercise data for immediate analysis, store and access over the cloud for further access using the web service. Leave audio comments immediately after completing the exercise and share with your coach. Capture route, distance, velocity, pulse and your personal evaluation data, across your exercises. Use the reporting suite in the web service to get detailed reports over time.Messaging: Communicate with your coach and team using messages or audio comments. Get instructions from your coach or team members, discuss your performance and adjust your training. Follow team discussion and interaction using the web service, world wide and in real time.For more information and registering to the web service visit:http://www.coach4pro.comBecome our fan:http://www.facebook.com/coach4proFollow us:http://www.twitter.com/coach4proVisit us: http://www.linkedin.com/company/coach4proContact us:sales@coach4pro.com
descriptionHTML:
Start using Coach4Pro for Professional Sports Training & Coaching today!

Coach4Pro is the all-in-one professional coaching service that helps athletes, coaches and management to maximise their potential for greater results, in one easy to use system. Use the mobile application to track your results and the complementing web service to plan, analyse and report your performance over time.

Coach4Pro enables you to set goals for your entire training season, define your training, nutrition and recovery plans, track your training results and analyse your performance against the set targets. You can share the results with your coach and team members, and communicate with messages and voice comments. The service enables you store the data, manage your files and manage your team.

All your training data is automatically collected by the mobile application and transferred to your personal and private web profile, for further analysis, sharing and storage, at https://my.coach4pro.com. The data is fully secure, confidential and for you to decide with whom to share. All data transfer happens real time and worldwide.

Different Bluetooth Smart compatible heart rate belts and sensors can be used with the application, depending on your sport, focus and measurement needs.

Feature Highlights:

Coach4Pro is the first digital, all-in-one professional coaching service for sports, including all the key features you need to define, measure, report and communicate your training progress, including:

Diary: Access and manage your daily, weekly, monthly and annual calendars, with visualisations to different exercise, team and activity plans. Sync schedules, calendars and plans with your coach and team. Follow your longterm progress using the web service, adjust your season plans and review your progress against the plan.

Exercises: Record your ad hoc or planned exercise data for immediate analysis, store and access over the cloud for further access using the web service. Leave audio comments immediately after completing the exercise and share with your coach. Capture route, distance, velocity, pulse and your personal evaluation data, across your exercises. Use the reporting suite in the web service to get detailed reports over time.
Messaging: Communicate with your coach and team using messages or audio comments. Get instructions from your coach or team members, discuss your performance and adjust your training. Follow team discussion and interaction using the web service, world wide and in real time.

For more information and registering to the web service visit:
http://www.coach4pro.com

recentChanges: - Fixed bug in data transfer during exercise that was causing the app to freeze.
